holidays.title: National Wine Day
holidays.description: Cheers to celebrating over a bottle of wine!

holidays.title: African Liberation Day
holidays.description: Go get yourself a vuvuzela and get ready because we’re going to do African Liberation Day in style.

holidays.title: Chardonnay Day
holidays.description: Celebrating Chardonnay, crafted from the beautiful vineyards of Pinot noir and Gouais blanc.

holidays.title: Erev Shavuot
holidays.description: Read on to find out how you should be celebrating Erev Shavuot.

holidays.title: Geek Pride Day
holidays.description: Journey through the fantastic world of geek culture on Geek Pride Day.

holidays.title: Global Africa Day
holidays.description: Today we honor the homeland, the African continent, and shine a light on her progress.

holidays.title: International Skin Pigmentation Day
holidays.description: Join in the conversation about uneven skin and learn how to handle it.

holidays.title: Jordan Independence Day
holidays.description: Put on your dishdashas and come join us as we celebrate Jordan’s Independence Day!

holidays.title: May Revolution Day
holidays.description: This May Revolution Day, let us commemorate the strength and courage of the Argentinian people.

holidays.title: May Revolution Day
holidays.description: Wave the flag of Argentina’s independence high on the occasion of May 25!

holidays.title: National Bath Bomb Day
holidays.description: Grab your robe and your favorite face peel because we’re celebrating this one the right way.

holidays.title: National Brown-Bag It Day
holidays.description: ‘Brown-bagging it’ helps you save money and eat healthier.

holidays.title: National Cody Day
holidays.description: Cody has been among the most famous names in the U.S. these past five years.

holidays.title: National Enzo Day
holidays.description: Enzo is an Italian name that sounds sweet yet sexy at the same time.

holidays.title: National George Day
holidays.description: Join people named George across the globe as they celebrate their name day.

holidays.title: National Missing Children’s Day
holidays.description: Today we remember missing children and spread the word about child abduction

holidays.title: National Sing Out Day
holidays.description: Channel your inner melodious voice and get ready to sing your blues away.

holidays.title: National Tap Dance Day
holidays.description: Tap your way through the day as we celebrate this original American dance form.

holidays.title: National VTuber Day
holidays.description: Step into the world of virtual reality where you can have your own avatar!

holidays.title: Shavuot
holidays.description: Shavuot—or the Feast of Weeks—is a Jewish holiday, with an agricultural and biblical significance.

holidays.title: Towel Day
holidays.description: We are celebrating this holiday with a towel wrapped around our necks.

holidays.title: World Thyroid Day
holidays.description: Join millions across the globe in the fight against thyroid disease on World Thyroid Day.

holidays.title: Avery Gay’s Birthday
holidays.description: A millennial ballet dancer on a magnificent journey to pursue her dreams!

holidays.title: Chloe Lukasiak’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented dancer and actress has won the hearts of many with her talent and personality.

holidays.title: Cillian Murphy’s Birthday
holidays.description: Cillian Murphy, an Irish-born actor, is much more than meets the eye.

holidays.title: Mike Myers’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented actor-comedian has always been a high achiever and is a man of many talents.

holidays.title: Roman Reigns’s Birthday
holidays.description: This undefeated wrestling champion has always been a driving force in sports.

holidays.title: Thorgy Thor’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn how this drag queen got her career started and rose to stardom.
